Holy monka. Where do I start? Well, I got this game not long after my application to the Steam community in 2013. I had no idea what I was in for, for 5 years this game has been the closest to my heart for the mystery, characters, story and gameplay experience. Damn, writer's block is a hell of a pain in the  a r s e  .  All I want to say is that I've loved this game ever since I dived into it, from the moment I woke up in a room with an announcer set to play horrible jazz, to the moment I noclipped thr- *ahem*Sorry, - to the moment I stumbled upon the 7 Ratman dens and held onto a metal ball to save my life and SMELT THE FRESH AIR, finally being set free from the emotional horrors this game has bestowed upon me plus the mild insanity I've conjured from thinking deeply about the lore.      I ' v e   l o v e d   a n d   h a t e d   t h i s   g a m e   f o r   a   g o o d   p a r t   o f   m y   l i f e    ~ _,~
good puzzle game

Bu zamana kadar oynadığım en iyi bulmaca oyunu kendisi. Portal 1 den sonra üstüne o kadar şey koymuşlarki -hikaye olarak-
üçün çıkmasına gerek kalmamış. Yani amacınız sadece aptal gibi oturup, ordan oraya gidip bulmaca çözmek değil. Senaryosu çok kaliteli kurgulanmış ve oyuna çok güzel yedirilmiş. Benim için bir Half Life 2 eder. Şiddetle tavsiye ederim. 9.5/10

[h1]Valve's Puzzle-Platformer Masterpiece[/h1]
Portal 2 does everything a proper sequel should, innovating on the existing gameplay while adding new elements into the mix, as well as being more ambitious and expansive than the original.

Pros –
+ A great plot highlights the excellent single player campaign.
+ The puzzles are challenging and rewarding.
+ Clever and memorable characters GLaDOS, Wheatley and Cave Johnson add to P2's charm
+ Longer playtime than Portal 1
+ Story Mods help make up for Portal 2's low replayability.
+ Co-Op Mode allows you to test, and contribute to science with friends.

Cons –
- Pacing lags in the second half of the SP campaign

[b] [u] [h1] M A S T E R P I E C E [/h1] [/u] [/b]

Increíble juego de principio a fin. Excelente obra de arte de parte de Valve.
La historia es genial, dos personajes únicos y con un humor buenísimo.
Valve supo expandir y utilizar los nuevos recursos de una forma perfecta, no le falta ni sobra nada.
Podré jugarlo una y mil veces y siempre lo disfrutaré como la primera. 
SI no jugaste este juego todavía no sé que haces con tu vida, el universo Portal es lo mejor que puede pasarle a alguien de la Master Race.

Magst du britischen Dialekt? Und vieleicht auch noch den dazupassenden Humor? Magst du Vortsetzungen die (man mag es gar nicht laut aussprechen) BESSER als ihre Vorgänger sind? Bist du ein Fan von Physik-Rätseln? Willst du es diesen verdammten Wissenschaftlern zeigen in dem du willkürlich Löcher in ihr ach-so-wertvolles Raum-Zeit-Kontinuum reißt? Willst du ein Spiel das dich irgendwie an "Half Life 2" errinert aber ein wirkliches Ende hat, das man zumindest als Abschluss einer geliebten und gefeierten Spielereihe sehen kann (wenn man will)? HASST DU ES AUCH WENN DAS LEBEN DIR ZITRONEN GIBT? Dann, mein lieber Freund, ist "2" deine Antwort. Kein längeres Raten, wieviele Straßen ein Mensch entlanggehen muss. Die Antwort ist "2". (Außer du willst dir "Half Life" kaufen. Dann ist deine Antwort vermutlich "3 +/-UNENDLICH, VALVE HASST DICH UND WILL DICH LEIDEN SEHEN") Sorry. Aber "Portal 2" ist wirklich gut. Sein Geld wert. Coole Physik-Rätsel, mehr und noch besser und noch schwieriger als im ersten Teil, diesmal sogar mit einer richtigen Story... Glaub ich? Zumindest mit guten Charakteren. Außer dem Spielercharakter. Sie nicht. Cell ist eine schreckliche Person. Aber das findet man ja im Spiel heraus. Wenn ihr mich entschuldigt, ich muss einige ÄUßERST WÜTENDE Beschwerdebriefe an ein gewisses Entwicklerstudio schreiben.
ORDAN ORAYA IŞINLANMA SİMULATOR (ŞAKA ŞAKA EFSANE OYUN )

Portal 2 is a great game, I wold not say it's a "must have" or a "must play" but compared to Portal 1, it's much better. A lot of new rooms, a REAL story, and an online game, and you can create levels or play those made by others. It's like unlimited content. I think so. The only downside it's if you know what you are doing, it's just too fast :/

I love Portal 1 & 2. Great unique game mechanics, awesome sense of humour, challenging-but-not-impossible puzzles, doesn't rely too much in my quick-precision shooting (which is why I don't like FPS - I'm glad this one in different). And portal 2 has the new coop mode that is quite fun too! And you can play it via internet, which is awesome, I played with my friend and we had lots of fun! ^_^ Just found the coop part too short... :$ fortunately this is the game that has the most mods ever I think, or at least from my collection.

First review. Just wanna say that it's worth it - whether it be on sale or not. Great game. Funny. I've only recently started the single player, and it's great even like that. I got this game for the purpose of playing it with a friend, which will more than likely take ages to complete with them considering we like to make it difficult for one another - which tends to make it hilarious. But the whole story and it's concept is great! :) I'd recommend it to all. Gives a pretty good feeling whenever you complete a level and get to the next.
